Automated Taxonomy Discovery and Exploration

Jiaming Shen, Xiaotao Gu, Yu Meng, and Jiawei Han

 

Wikimedia Visual Resources and its Application to Neural Visual Recommender Systems

Roles Analytics in Networks – Foundations, Methods and Applications

Complement, Composite and Context: The 3C-Law to Build Multidomain Recommender Systems

Liang Hu, Shoujin Wang, Qi Zhang, Dora D. Liu, and Longbing Cao
